title: Looking for Roomate
posting_body: ['Looking for someone to share a 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in Kew Gardens.', 'About the Building / Space: elevator building in the heart of Kew Gardens… quick walk to LIRR, Q10 and E train… also  Within walking distance to restaurants, bars, and grocery stores.', 'Laundry in building….The main living area of the apartment is furnished ( couch, tv, entertainment center, table and chairs) and also includes and outdoor patio/ balcony.', 'A/C and heat in each room.', 'About Us: we are two flight attendants who will be sharing the smaller bedroom.', 'We will be in a out throughout the month but for very short periods of time….', 'As our permanent residence will be out of state.', 'About You: We are looking for someone to take over the unfurnished larger bedroom with en suite bathroom.', 'Someone who is responsible , pays rent on time, clean/ picks up after themselves.', 'Not into throwing large parties….', 'And is respectful of the space.', 'Rent: 1500 per month plus a one month security deposit.', 'Utilities are negotiable but include electric, gas, and WiFi.', 'If interested or have any questions  please call or text to talk and see if it would be a good fit!', 'Thank you!']
